objects.specification: A seamless floor with a smooth medium-grey concrete-like finish, providing a neutral and durable base for the entire classroom.
A tall wall painted in soft pastel white with a smooth matte finish, creating a calm and spacious front surface for instructional displays.
A tall wall painted in soft pastel white with a smooth matte finish, creating a calm and spacious background surface.
A tall side wall painted in soft pastel white with a smooth matte finish, providing a calm atmosphere along the left side.

A larger rectangular teacher’s desk in a dark wood tone with sturdy straight legs, offering a smooth and expansive workspace.
A high-backed teacher’s chair with a dark wood-tone frame and a subtly cushioned neutral-fabric seat, combining comfort with professional style.
